## grants

**Type:** [GrantsConnection!](objects#grantsconnection)

<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
after<br />

</td>
<td>

</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
before<br />
<a href="scalars#string"><code>String</code></a>
</td>
<td>
<p>Paginating backwards: the cursor after the the requested page.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

<a href="scalars#int"><code>Int</code></a>
</td>
<td>

</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
last<br />
<a href="scalars#int"><code>Int</code></a>
</td>
<td>

</td>
